page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: THERE IS A WIDE VARIETY OF HOUSING IN THE AREA.NORTH OF THE RIVER THERE ARE HIGH RISE FLATS AND TENEMENT PROPERTIES.SOUTH OF THE RIVER THE HOUSES MOSTLY COMPRISE OF TENEMENT PROPERTIES AND HIGH RISE FLATS,WITH SOME TERRACED, SEMI-DETACHED,AND DETACHED HOUSES WITHIN THE AREA. BUILDERS HAVE BEEN RENOVATING OLDER PROPERTIES, AND DEVELOPING NEW HOUSING PROJECTS,GIVING A NEW LOOK TO THE DISTRICT. MANY BUILDINGS HAVE RECENTLY BEEN SANDBLASTED.YEARS OF GRIME AND SOOT GIVE WAY TO REVEAL THE NATURAL STONE.THE{CITY CHAMBERS}IN THE CENTRE OF THE CITY IS A FINE EXAMPLE OF HOW MODERN METHODS ARE BEING USED TO UPGRADE AND IMPROVE THE ENVIRONMENT IN THE CENTRE OF GLASGOW.
